metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, 12 Days of Christmas has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
